sense.def:
One's neighbours
so ljudje, ki živijo v okolici, zlasti v neposredni soseščini.

seg.quote: Don't be afraid of what the neighbours will think.

sense.def:
One's neighbour
je tudi človek, ki stoji ali sedi poleg nas.

seg.quote: Rudolph turned his head towards his neighbour.

sense.def:
Za nekaj, kar je poleg ali blizu nečesa drugega, lahko rečemo, da je
its neighbour
.

seg.quote: The young plant risks being overshadowed by its neighbours.
